use_cases.title: Successful Signup with Valid Email and Password
use_cases.goal: To verify that a user can successfully sign up with a valid email and password
preconditions: User is on the signup page
steps: Enter a valid email address in the email field.
Enter a valid password in the password field and confirm it.
expected_results: System validates the email and password.
System creates the user account with inactive status.
System displays a 'Check your email' message to the user.

use_cases.title: Signup with Duplicate Email Registration (ERR_001)
use_cases.goal: To ensure the system rejects duplicate email registrations
preconditions: User is on the signup page
The email address is already registered in the system
steps: Enter an email address that is already registered in the system.
Enter a valid password and confirm it.
expected_results: System checks if email already exists.
System responds with a 409 Conflict HTTP Status.
User sees the message: 'This email is already registered. Please login or use a different email.'

use_cases.title: Signup with Invalid Email Format (ERR_002)
use_cases.goal: To validate that the system correctly handles and rejects malformed email formats
preconditions: User is on the signup page
steps: Enter a malformed email address in the email field (e.g., missing domain name).
Enter a valid password in the password field and confirm it.
Attempt to proceed with account creation.
expected_results: System validates email format in real-time and upon submission.
System responds with a 400 Bad Request HTTP Status.
User sees the message: 'Please enter a valid email address'
